issue.summary: Component AC187648.1 is causing an alignment issue in the chromosome 13 tile path.
issue.description: Component AC187648.1 is causing an alignment issue in the chromosome 13 tile path.
issue.resolution_text: Looked at alignments of all components in this region. Discovered that BX088578.4 and BX072579.14 align well to one another so removed AC187648.1 from the tile path. This caused another alignment problem so reverted TPF to original state and this issue will be dealt with in ticket HG-118 and it's related tickets.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the assembly between the components FP565577.3 and AC187648.1
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between the components FP565577.3 and AC187648.1. This reflects the updates referenced in HG-118.
issue.resolution_text: The accessions for this ticket have changed. It will now be tracked in ticket HG-1524.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the assembly between the components BX072579.14 and BX537329.2. This reflects the updates referenced in HG-529.
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between the components BX072579.14 and BX537329.2. This reflects the updates referenced in HG-529.
issue.resolution_text: The accessions for this ticket have changed. It will now be tracked in ticket HG-1525.

issue.summary: Confirm scaffold2999_1_134269.7:1-13450 is a correctly assembled human sequence.
issue.description: Confirm that scaffold2999_1_134269.7:1-13450, a 13Kb YH1 scaffold with no alignment to sequences in NR, is a correctly assembled human sequence.
issue.resolution_text: scaffold2999_1_134269.7:1-13450 has a high quality alignment to HuRef scaffold NW_001840306.1, and is represented in the YH1 assembly by GL296719.1. This sequence may belong in the gap being investigated in HG-60 .Efforts to include this sequence in the assembly will be tracked in HG-60.

issue.summary: GeneID: 6011 (GRK1), assembly gap
issue.description: Several of the exons for NM_002929.2 (GRK1) are missing in a gap in the refernce assembly
issue.resolution_text: The flanking accessions of this gap have now changed due to a contig re-orientation. Work on the updated gap will continue in the newly created ticket HG-1070.

issue.summary: Chr. 13 CHORI-17 Pathway
issue.description: Several clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AL359737.16 - AL137001.23 region in Chr. 13. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: This CH17 pathway does not meet the criteria to replace the reference or for alt_loci creation.

issue.summary: Chromosome 13 assembly gap (AL138715.11 - AL138715.11)
issue.status_text: 18-NOV-13: ABC7-42418200C9 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 Accession for ABC7-42418200C9: FO681491
issue.description: The GRCh37 component AL138715.11 is missing euchromatic sequence on the q-arm side of the centromere. Clones will be selected to extend from this component until heterochromatic or centromeric repeats are identified.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chromosome 13 assembly gap (FP565344.2 - FP565796.3)
issue.description: Assembly gap between FP565344.2 (ABC13-49756300M17) and FP565796.3 (ABC14-1065514J1)
issue.resolution_text: The components of this issue have changed. The gap mentioned in this issue will now be tracked in HG-1817.

issue.summary: Chromosome 13 assembly gap (BX537332.1 - FP565798.2)
issue.status_text: ABC9-43933500D16 is in active finishing 29-NOV-12: CH17-281G15 has entered the sequencing pipeline Accession for ABC9-43933500D16: FO082817
issue.description: Assembly gap between BX537332.1 (WI2-84521D6) and FP565798.2 (ABC8-41795000B18)
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chromosome 13 assembly gap (FP565577.3 - AC187648.1)
issue.status_text: There are currenly no clones to pick which would span or extend into this gap. The issue will be revisited at a later time.
issue.description: Assembly gap between FP565577.3 (ABC8-41112900H4) and AC187648.1 (WI2-3697E2)
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chromosome 13 assembly gap (FP565324.3 - FP565325.3)
issue.description: Assembly gap between FP565324.3 (ABC13-47488600E17) and FP565325.3 (ABC11-48016100C7)
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig AUXG01000135.1 has been added to the TPF closing the gap in the chromosome between components FP565324.3 and FP565325.3

issue.summary: BAGE1, BAGE3, BAGE5 and BAGE6 missing in Assembly
issue.status_text: Since AL161418.8 can't be localised at present it could be put on chromosome 13 unlocalised for the next build. AL161418.8 has now been moved to chromosome 13, based on evidence in paper 12461691. This component contains BAGE5.
issue.description: Several members of the BAGE gene family are not represented on chromosome 13 in the current reference assembly.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 574 (BAGE), missing in assembly
issue.description: There is conflicting mapping data, as the BAGE gene has been reported on Hsa13, but the best alignment in the current assembly is to Hsa21.
issue.resolution_text: I am resolving this ticket as a duplicate as all further work on BAGE1 will be tracked in HG-156.

issue.summary: GeneID: 85318 (BAGE3), missing in assembly
issue.description: NM_182481.1 is missing from the current reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: I am resolving this ticket as a duplicate as all further work on BAGE3 will be tracked in HG-156.

issue.summary: The GRCh37 assembly is missing copies of an interchromosomal duplication originating from chr. 4q35.2.
issue.description: The GRCh37 assembly is missing copies of an interchromosomal duplication originating from chr. 4q35.2. The other copies of this duplication are on chr. 13, 14 and 21, For more info, see PubMed: 21030649 (Supplementary Fig. S24)
issue.resolution_text: In GRCh38, we have added representation for some of the missing copies. Components thought to localise to chromosome 13 and 14 have been added as unplaced scaffolds until they can be more firmly localized (NT_187505.1, NT_187508.1, NT_187509.1, NT_187510.1). The following tickets track further work on these scaffolds: HG-1966, HG-1964, HG-2011 and HG-2012. Representation for the chr. 21 copy is on the short arm of NC_000021.9: 9,527,144-10,169,868; see also HG-1583.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC234343.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC234343.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC234343.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly. This component cannot be localised at this time and has been added the unlocalised tile path file.

issue.summary: Chromosome 13 assembly gap (FO538767.4 - FO624990.1)
issue.status_text: No suitable clones to pick at present. The gap sized by optical mapping data is 4kb
issue.description: Assembly gap between FO538767.4 (ABC8-41207300F1) and FO624990.1 (ABC8-43014700C16).
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC238892.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component AC238892.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly. BLASTing it reveals an alignment to AL162499.20 which is on chromosome 13. AC238892.3 contains sequence not present on the reference assembly and so will be added to an alternative haplotype tile path.
issue.resolution_text: Non-component AC238892.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly. BLASTing it reveals an alignment to AL162499.20 which is on chromosome 13. AC238892.3 contains sequence not present on the reference assembly and so will be added to an alternative haplotype tile path.

issue.summary: Non-component AC002525.1 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Non-component AC002525.1 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: Non-component AC002525.1 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly. This component has since been added to the reference tile path so that the sequence is represented.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL354833.9
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines and overlapping component AL160252.20 indicate that the indel is sequence variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267229.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 13, suggest there may be ~2,512 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL354833.9. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL138822.13
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines and overlapping component AL359454.7 indicate that the indel is sequence variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267572.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 13, suggest there may be ~1,005 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL138822.13. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL161421.11
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines and overlapping component AL603827.2 indicate that the indel is sequence variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268438.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 13, suggest there may be ~1,095 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL161421.11. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL161423.9
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines indicate that the indel is sequence variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268578.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 13, suggest there may be ~2,689 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL161423.9. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL162493.21
issue.description: Analysis of GU267614.1, GU268413.1, GU268609.1, GU267793.1 and GU268001.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 13, suggest there may be ~10,168 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL162493.21. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: Component AC212759.2 has been added to the reference assembly. This sequence represents a 10.1kb insertion variation.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL157771.11
issue.description: Analysis of GU267278.1 and GU269117.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 13, suggest there may be ~6,203 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL157771.11. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: Component AC225710.3 has been added to the reference assembly. This sequence represents a 4.7kb insertion variation.

issue.summary: Chimeric clone in reference assembly
issue.description: GRCh38 component FO624990.1 is a chimeric clone partially aligning to chromosome 16. This component flanks the GRCh38 gap described in HG-1817.
issue.resolution_text: Component FO624990.1 is chimeric to chromosome 16 and has been removed from the TPF. Component FP565796.3 has been restored to the TPF.

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.description: Ambiguous IUPAC bases in NC_000013.11: 100973393 (K), 100972571 (Y) and 100973395 (Y) in component AEKP01041322.1.
issue.resolution_text: Component AL139374 has recieved an accession.version update to AL139374.19. This update extends the finish of the component and this sequence has replaced GRCh38 component AEKP01041322.1 removing the ambiguous bases from the reference assembly. The extended sequence of AL139374.19 also makes patch contigs KF455817.1 and KF455820.1 redundent and these have been removed from the reference assembly.

issue.summary: Restoring component dropped from GRCh38
issue.description: Component FP565325.3 inadvertently dropped from GRCh38 restored to TPF
issue.resolution_text: Component FP565325.3 has been restored to the TPF flanking the gap referenced in JIRA ticket HG-1525

issue.summary: Alignment problem caused by AUXG01000135.1
issue.description: Overlap between BX537329.2 and AL161774.49 has been split by the addition of WGS contig AUXG01000135.1 causing and artificial duplication in the reference assembly.
issue.resolution_text: The overlap between BX537239.2 and AL161774.49 has been restored removing the artificial duplication caused by AUXG01000135.1

issue.summary: Component AL161418.14 captures missing BAGE5 gene
issue.description: Finished component AL161418.14 containing the BAGE5 gene has been added to the TPF
issue.resolution_text: Component AL161418.14 containing the BAGE5 gene has been added to the reference assembly.

issue.summary: Assembly component AL139374.19 has had an accession.version update
issue.description: Assembly component AL139374.19 has had an accession.version update. GRC curator review needed to ensure proper representation in future assembly versions.
issue.resolution_text: The update of assembly component AL139374.19 is described in HG-2249, no further curation is required here

issue.summary: GeneID: 1602 (DACH1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_080760.3 (DACH1) and the genomic sequence in the reference to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: AMYH02028239.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 11 Reference tile path to update the 6nt indel that was observed here.

issue.summary: GeneID: 4752 (NEK3), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_002498.2 (NEK3) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459684.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 13 Reference to update the base to the more common allele to improve representation of GeneID: 4752 (NEK3) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Chr.13 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly in component AL138715.11
issue.resolution_text: Ticket was initially raised to address gap between the telomere and component AL138715.11. Being acrocentric, chromosome 13 TPF has been modified by insertion of short-arm, centromeric, and heterochromatic gaps. The decision has been taken not to insert any type-3 gaps between heterochromatic gaps and adjacent TPF components. The ticket can, therefore, be resolved.

issue.summary: Chr.13 Gap Problem
issue.description: No problem- report submitted in error
issue.resolution_text: No problem- Gap report is a duplicate of HG-59

issue.summary: Chr.13 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components BX088578.4 and BX537329.2
issue.resolution_text: The flanking accessions of this gap have now changed due to a contig re-orientation. Work on the updated gap will continue in the newly created ticket HG-1071.

issue.summary: Chr.13 Clone Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly in component AL845154.5
issue.resolution_text: WI2-1528O10 (AC213859.2) extends off AC845154.5 into the telomeric repeats. It adds ~10kb additional sequence. This patch closes the gap located between the telomere and component AC845154.5 in reference chromosome NC_000013.10.

issue.summary: Chr. 13 Gap Problem Region #1
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between BX072584.1 and BX088568.4
issue.resolution_text: The accessions for this ticket have changed. It will now be tracked in ticket HG-1522.

issue.summary: Chr. 13 Gap Problem Region #2
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AL359649.8 and AL591932.8
issue.resolution_text: The accessions for this ticket have changed. It will now be tracked in ticket HG-1523.

issue.summary: Chr.13 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly in component AL845154.5
issue.resolution_text: This issue is a duplicate of issue HG-531. Please see Jira issue HG-531 for all future updates regarding this issue.

issue.summary: Assignment of unplaced contig NT_113923 to chr.13 is questionable
issue.description: Alignment analysis suggests that the assignment of unplaced contig NT_113923 to chr.13 is questionable
issue.resolution_text: Evidence from 1000 genomes and FISH analysis place component AL356585.7 on chromosome 13. The component will be placed on the unlocalised tile path until its precise location can be determined.

issue.summary: GeneID: 100130386 (LOC100130386), assembly gap, chromosome
issue.description: LOC100130386 (Gene ID: 100130386) falls in a gap in the Build 36 assembly between components BX537316.2 and BX072579.14.
issue.resolution_text: This issue is a duplicate of issue HG-118. Please see Jira issue HG-118 for all future updates regarding this issue.

issue.summary: Sequence in Build 36 missing in Build36C
issue.description: Unfinished clone AL606964 needs removing from the TPF and replaced by finished clone AC017111
issue.resolution_text: TPF has been updated to replace AL606964 with AC017111

issue.summary: WI2-2182D8 may be missing sequence from chr.13
issue.description: AC188786.1 may be sequence that is missing from chr. 13
issue.resolution_text: This issue is a duplicate of issue HG-60. Please see JIRA issue HG-60 for all future updates regarding this issue.
